projects.title: Linear Regression
projects.author: cneuralnetwork
projects.description: A comprehensive tutorial on linear regression, covering the mathematical foundations, implementation from scratch, and practical applications. Learn how to build and evaluate linear models for prediction tasks.

projects.title: Optimization Algorithms
projects.author: cneuralnetwork
projects.description: Deep dive into optimization algorithms used in machine learning. Explore gradient descent variants, adaptive learning rate methods, and their impact on model training performance.

projects.title: Performance Metrics
projects.author: yashasnadigsyn
projects.description: Complete guide to machine learning evaluation metrics. Learn when and how to use accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score, ROC curves, and other essential metrics for model assessment.

categories.name: Deep Learning
categories.description: Neural networks and deep learning projects
